member.name: M:Cake.DotNetDotCoverTest.DotNetCoreDotCoverTester.#ctor(Cake.Core.IO.IFileSystem,Cake.Core.ICakeEnvironment,Cake.Core.IO.IProcessRunner,Cake.Core.Tooling.IToolLocator)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Cake.DotNetDotCoverTest.DotNetCoreDotCoverTester.Test(System.String,Cake.DotNetDotCoverTest.DotNetCoreDotCoverTestSettings)
member.summary: Tests the project using the specified path with arguments and settings.

member.name: P:Cake.DotNetDotCoverTest.DotNetCoreDotCoverTestSettings.Settings
member.summary: Gets or sets the settings file to use when running tests.

member.name: P:Cake.DotNetDotCoverTest.DotNetCoreDotCoverTestSettings.Filter
member.summary: Gets or sets the filter expression to filter out tests in the current project.
member.remarks: For more information on filtering support, see https://aka.ms/vstest-filtering

member.name: P:Cake.DotNetDotCoverTest.DotNetCoreDotCoverTestSettings.TestAdapterPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to use for the custom test adapter in the test run.

member.name: P:Cake.DotNetDotCoverTest.DotNetCoreDotCoverTestSettings.Logger
member.summary: Gets or sets a logger for test results

member.name: P:Cake.DotNetDotCoverTest.DotNetCoreDotCoverTestSettings.OutputDirectory
member.summary: Gets or sets the output directory.

member.name: P:Cake.DotNetDotCoverTest.DotNetCoreDotCoverTestSettings.Configuration
member.summary: Gets or sets the configuration under which to build.

member.name: P:Cake.DotNetDotCoverTest.DotNetCoreDotCoverTestSettings.Framework
member.summary: Gets or sets specific framework to compile.

member.name: P:Cake.DotNetDotCoverTest.DotNetCoreDotCoverTestSettings.NoBuild
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to not build the project before testing.

member.name: P:Cake.DotNetDotCoverTest.DotNetCoreDotCoverTestSettings.NoRestore
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to not do implicit NuGet package restore. This makes build faster, but requires restore to be done before build is executed.

member.name: P:Cake.DotNetDotCoverTest.DotNetCoreDotCoverTestSettings.DiagnosticFile
member.summary: Gets or sets a file to write diagnostic messages to.

member.name: P:Cake.DotNetDotCoverTest.DotNetCoreDotCoverTestSettings.ResultsDirectory
member.summary: Gets or sets the results directory. This setting is only available from 2.0.0 upward.

member.name: P:Cake.DotNetDotCoverTest.DotNetCoreDotCoverTestSettings.VSTestReportPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the file path to write VSTest reports to.
